title: Aliens (1986) - Sentry Gun Console Font
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317102836im_/http:/typophile.com/files/bscap0004_3583.jpg)

Hi guys,

I'm hoping you can help me name this font? I was watching Aliens again last night, and when this scene came on, I suddenly decided I must know the name of this font! :)

After reading through some of the other font id threads, there is some serious talent on this board, so I have high hopes that you guys can help me. =^D

All the best,

Kc

Font: 

 Screener 

Solved By: 

 [donshottype](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317102836/http:/typophile.com/user/205259 "View user profile.")
author: Kccool2

comments.content:
Perhaps you can find a substitute here;  
 [http://fontm.com/category/techno/lcd/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317102836/http:/fontm.com/category/techno/lcd/ "http://fontm.com/category/techno/lcd/")  
Most of these fonts are made as a labor of love by amateurs, but there are perhaps some that are rips of fonts produced by others and thus are not legitimate. Cavete deorsum pondus.  
Don
This is the closest one I found: [Carbon Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317102836/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/t26/carbon/bold/glyphs.html)

Found an arcade alphabet that is almost identical for both letters and numbers. Patrick Griffin's Screener from Canada Type

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317102836im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ScreenerRegCTsm_3978.jpg)
  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/screener/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317102836/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/screener/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/screener/")  
You have to add the LCD effect.  
Don
Oh my god.. That's amazing, thank you so much!! This will look awesome on my phone. Screener is the one! You rock Don, thank you, thank you and thank you again! :)
